text: Assemble the items needed. These are listed below under "Things You'll Need". Pour the water into the mixing bowl. Add the cornstarch. Stir it thoroughly until dissolved in the water. Set aside. Pour the milk into the large saucepan or pot. Place on the heat and cook until it simmers. Stir often to prevent the mixture from burning. Stir the cornstarch and water mix into the milk once it has reached simmering point. Stir around, then remove from the heat. At this point, the atole should have thickened. Look for a consistency around that of a milkshake. Sprinkle in the sugar. Stir it around to dissolve. Sprinkle cinnamon into the atole. Stir through the drink. Pour the atole into mugs ready for drinking. You can pour it into bowls if preferred. Serve.
